title: It's not uncommon to have 2-3 ADC's per game
body: So we'll go ahead and just keep on nerfing any viable tanks and tank items.

replies.body:
Keep in mind the power level of ADC's is also linked to the power level of tanks and not inversely related.
Tanks are indeed the best class to protect the ADC class and make them shine, and ADC's are also the safest class to DPS tanks.

Tanks are strong = ADC are strong.
Tanks are weak = ADC are not too strong. Except if they have good mobility and self peel tools, which is the bane of balancing and is sadly the case for some of those.

>It's not uncommon to have 2-3 ADC's per game

yeah back in pre season 6. 
What the fuck are you talking about?

are you not aware that Lucian top or mid is in almost every game nowadays

And then you have things like twitch jungle being more common now. I have had 3 adcs on one of the teams several times now.

In fact, its more common to have Lucian in mid or top now with an adc bot than not. Are you not experiencing the same thing?
I have faced/played with 2 lucian mids. I have not seen a twitch jungle in a very long time. If you could provide some hard evidence other than anecdotes then maybe i would believe you.
